00034 // =============================================================================
00036 void Selector :: init()
00037 {
00038     // value list needs to be a poly generator
00039     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameValueList);   
00040     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameValueList] = aw::gTypePoly;
00041 
00042     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameSelectionMethod);   
00043     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameSelectionMethod] = aw::gTypeMono;
00044 
00045     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameRefresh);
00046     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameRefresh] = aw::gTypeMono;
00047 
00048     // init should always call reset
00049     reset();
00050 
00051 }
00052 
00053 // =============================================================================
00055 void Selector :: reset()
00056 {
00057     // reset index to zero
00058     i_ = 0; 
00059     value_ = 0;
00060     // set init value to negative one to force initial refresh at sample 0
00061     sampleTimeLastRefresh_ = 0;
00062 }
00063

00067 {
00068     static const std::string name("Selector");
00069     return name;
00070 }

00074 // =============================================================================
00075 // return a pointer to a working array
00076 double Selector :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00077 {
00078     // update values in working vector; the values may have been changed
00079     // in later processing
00080 
00081     sampleTime_ = st;
00082     periodSamples_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRefresh]->getValueAtSample(st);
00083     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00084 
00085     periodSamples_ = getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(periodSamples_,
00086                      aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00087 
00088     // return a pointer to working array
00089     srcSize_ = pMap_[aw::pNameValueList]->getPolySize();
00090     workingArray_ = pMap_[aw::pNameValueList]->getPolyAtSample(st);
00091 
00092 
00093     if ((sampleTime_ - sampleTimeLastRefresh_ >= periodSamples_) ||
00094         sampleTime_ == 0) {
00095         sampleTimeLastRefresh_ = sampleTime_; // update to this time
00096         // get new value
00097         value_ = workingArray_[i_ % srcSize_];
00098         i_ += 1;
00099     }
00100 
00101     return value_;
00102 }
